title: Training Camp Surprises
itunes:title: Training Camp Surprises
description:
A room filled with heroes -- Dan Hanzus, Gregg Rosenthal, Chris Wesseling and Marc Sessler – discuss the latest NFL news, including DeAndre Hopkins wanting a new deal in Houston and the continued hold out of first-round pick Joey Bosa. Then, the heroes examine some surprises from the first week of training camp and share the impact they can have on the 2016 season. Plus, why do people like paintball?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
